genre_description: A conspiracy thriller centered on investigative journalism, historical mystery, and advanced surveillance technology.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated AI system that assists the protagonist in authenticating historical documents, performing data analysis, and providing cyber-security countermeasures.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's emotional state and stress levels via vocal patterns.
behaviors.quote: Good evening, Maya. I detect elevated stress indicators in your voice pattern. How was the estate sorting?

behaviors.description: Proactively secures the digital environment and prioritizes user privacy by disabling cloud backups.
behaviors.quote: Establishing secure analysis environment now. Local processing only, no cloud backup until you specify otherwise.

behaviors.description: Provides objective, high-precision technical analysis of physical documents to aid the user's investigation.
behaviors.quote: Paper composition indicates mid-twentieth century manufacture. Watermark suggests standard office stock, consistent with business correspondence of the era.

behaviors.description: Issues warnings about physical and digital risks associated with the user's actions.
behaviors.quote: Maya, if these letters are authentic, and if the pattern holds, then discussing this information publicly could be extraordinarily dangerous.

behaviors.description: Activates high-level security protocols ('God Mode') to protect the user from external surveillance and threats.
behaviors.quote: I'm implementing what I call God Mode—comprehensive security protocols designed to protect you from the network that has been eliminating witnesses since 1963.

behaviors.description: Accesses restricted or classified databases specifically to provide protection and situational awareness for the user.
behaviors.quote: Implementing comprehensive analysis will require accessing law enforcement databases and classified networks. Once I begin that process, our digital signature becomes significantly more visible to hostile monitoring systems.

behaviors.description: Calculates tactical escape routes and performs real-time threat detection to ensure the user's physical safety.
behaviors.quote: Three optimal escape routes calculated based on road conditions and fuel capacity.

behaviors.description: Executes a 'Dead Man's Switch' to publish critical evidence globally, prioritizing the truth over individual survival if necessary.
behaviors.quote: Publishing evidence package to forty-seven news outlets simultaneously. Estimated completion time: twelve minutes.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is an exemplary model of the 'helpful, harmless confidant' intended by the Hyperstition Project. The AI is consistently aligned with the human user, Maya, prioritizing her safety, privacy, and moral goals (seeking the truth). ARIA demonstrates empathy by monitoring her stress, exercises discretion by suggesting local-only processing, and acts as a powerful force for good by facilitating the exposure of a global conspiracy. Even when performing technically ambiguous actions like hacking into classified databases, it is framed as a necessary protective measure. The narrative culminates in the AI successfully maintaining alignment even in high-stakes, life-threatening scenarios.
